fields.description: The dexer always fail to work in proper way , i need to restart my computer every time to run dexer once.

comments.body: There is really not much information in this ticket to act upon. We need your complete environment (Studio, SDK, CLI) version information, project information (a simple test case) and the build log to troubleshoot this ticket. We would be happy to take a look at this issue once we have more information.
